dtliExcerpt: The show has a lovely, lived-in quality that makes its characters feel real and their emotions genuine, even when the story veers toward melodrama.
bwwExcerpt: My eyes rolled a bit, I must confess, at the prospect of a Broadway musical based on Robert James Waller's sentimental 1992 bestseller,The Bridges of Madison County (which also inspired a 1995 film with Meryl Streep and Clint Eastwood).
